parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The cluster ID of the instances.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The IDs of the instances. When you use this parameter to specify multiple instance IDs, separate the IDs with commas(,). Example: `InstanceId.1=i-bp1j4i2jdf3owlhe****, InstanceId.2=i-bp1j4i2jdf3o1234****`.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instances. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the instances. You can call the [DescribeZones](~~25610~~) operation to query the most recent zone list.
